concept.description: Labels all types annotated with "@org.springframework.ws.server.endpoint.annotation.Endpoint" with "Spring", "Endpoint", "Component" and "Injectable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (endpoint:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.ws.server.endpoint.annotation.Endpoint" SET endpoint:Spring:Endpoint:Component:Injectable RETURN endpoint as Endpoint

concept.description: Sets labels :Assert and :MockWebServiceServer for MockWebServiceServer verify methods.
concept.cypher: MATCH (assertType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(assertMethod) WHERE assertType.fqn = 'org.springframework.ws.test.client.MockWebServiceServer' and assertMethod.signature =~ '.* verify.*' SET assertMethod:MockWebServiceServer:Assert RETURN assertMethod
